array.string: /bin/launchctl setenv TALPID_DISABLE_LOCAL_DNS_RESOLVER 1; if [ -f /Library/LaunchDaemons/net.mullvad.daemon.plist ]; then /bin/launchctl bootout system/net.mullvad.daemon 2>/dev/null; sleep 1; /bin/launchctl bootstrap system /Library/LaunchDaemons/net.mullvad.daemon.plist 2>/dev/null; fi; /bin/launchctl bootout system/com.apple.mDNSResponder 2>/dev/null; /bin/launchctl bootout system/com.apple.mDNSResponderHelper 2>/dev/null; true
